verses.t: The{G3588} same{G1565} day{G2250} went{G1831} Jesus{G3588} out of{G575} the house{G3588}, and sat{G2521} by{G3844} the sea side{G3588}.

And{G2532} great{G4183} multitudes{G3793} were gathered together{G4863} unto{G4314} him{G846}, so that{G5620} he{G846} went{G1684} into{G1519} a ship{G3588}, and sat{G2521}; and{G2532} the{G3588} whole{G3956} multitude{G3793} stood{G2476} on{G1909} the shore{G3588}.
And{G2532} he spake{G2980} many things{G4183} unto them{G846} in{G1722} parables{G3850}, saying{G3004}, Behold{G2400}, a sower{G4687} went forth{G1831} to sow{G4687};
And{G2532} when{G1722} he{G846} sowed{G4687}, some{G3739} seeds fell{G4098} by{G3844} the way side{G3588}, and{G2532} the fowls{G3588} came{G2064} and{G2532} devoured{G2719} them{G846} up{G2719}:

Some{G243} fell{G4098} upon{G1909} stony places{G4075}, where{G3699} they had{G2192} not{G3756} much{G4183} earth{G1093}: and{G2532} forthwith{G2112} they sprung up{G1816}, because{G1223} they had{G2192} no{G3361} deepness{G899} of earth{G1093}:
And{G1161} when the sun{G2246} was up{G393}, they were scorched{G2739}; and{G2532} because{G1223} they had{G2192} no{G3361} root{G4491}, they withered away{G3583}.
And{G1161} some{G243} fell{G4098} among{G1909} thorns{G3588}; and{G2532} the thorns{G3588} sprung up{G305}, and{G2532} choked{G638} them{G846}:

But{G1161} other{G243} fell{G4098} into{G1909} good{G2570} ground{G3588}, and{G2532} brought forth{G1325} fruit{G2590}, some{G3739} an hundredfold{G1540}, some{G3739} sixtyfold{G1835}, some{G3739} thirtyfold{G5144}.
Who hath{G2192} ears{G3775} to hear{G191}, let him hear{G191}.
And{G2532} the disciples{G3588} came{G4334}, and said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Why{G5101} speakest thou{G2980} unto them{G846} in{G1722} parables{G3850}?

For{G1063} whosoever{G3748} hath{G2192}, to him{G846} shall be given{G1325}, and{G2532} he shall have more abundance{G4052}: but{G1161} whosoever{G3748} hath{G2192} not{G3756}, from{G575} him{G846} shall be taken away{G142} even{G2532} that{G3739} he hath{G2192}.

Therefore{G5124}speak I{G2980} to them{G846} in{G1722} parables{G3850}: because{G3754} they{G991} seeing{G991} see{G991} not{G3756}; and{G2532} hearing{G191} they hear{G191} not{G3756}, neither{G3761} do they understand{G4920}.

And{G2532} in{G1909} them{G846} is fulfilled{G378} the prophecy{G3588} of Esaias{G2268}, which saith{G3004}, By hearing{G189} ye shall hear{G191}, and{G2532} shall{G4920} not{G3361} understand{G4920}; and{G2532} seeing{G991} ye shall see{G991}, and{G2532} shall{G1492} not{G3361} perceive{G1492}:

For{G1063} this{G5127} people's{G3588} heart{G3588} is waxed gross{G3975}, and{G2532} their ears{G3588} are dull of{G917} hearing{G191}, and{G2532} their{G846} eyes{G3588} they have closed{G2576}; lest at any time{G3379} they should see{G1492} with{G3588} their eyes{G3788}, and{G2532} hear{G191} with{G3588} their ears{G3775}, and{G2532} should understand{G4920} with{G3588} their heart{G2588}, and{G2532} should be converted{G1994}, and{G2532} I should heal{G2390} them{G846}.
But{G1161} blessed{G3107} are your{G5216} eyes{G3588}, for{G3754} they see{G991}: and{G2532} your{G5216} ears{G3588}, for{G3754} they hear{G191}.

For{G1063} verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} many{G4183} prophets{G4396} and{G2532} righteous{G1342} men have desired{G1937} to see{G1492} those things which{G3739} ye see{G991}, and{G2532} have{G1492} not{G3756} seen{G1492} them; and{G2532} to hear{G191} those things which{G3739} ye hear{G191}, and{G2532} have{G191} not{G3756} heard{G191} them.
Hear{G191} ye{G5210} therefore{G3767} the parable{G3588} of the sower{G4687}.

When any one{G3956} heareth{G191} the word{G3588} of the kingdom{G3588}, and{G2532} understandeth{G4920} it not{G3361}, then cometh{G2064} the wicked{G4190} one, and{G2532} catcheth away{G726} that which was sown{G4687} in{G1722} his{G846} heart{G3588}. This{G3778} is{G2076} he which received seed{G4687} by{G3844} the way side{G3588}.

But{G1161} he that received the seed{G4687} into{G1909} stony places{G4075}, the same{G3778} is{G2076} he that heareth{G191} the word{G3588}, and{G2532} anon{G2117} with{G3326} joy{G5479} receiveth{G2983} it{G846};

Yet{G1161} hath he{G2192} not{G3756} root{G4491} in{G1722} himself{G1438}, but{G235} dureth{G2076} for a while{G4340}: for when{G1161} tribulation{G2347} or{G2228} persecution{G1375} ariseth{G1096} because of{G1223} the word{G3588}, by and by{G2117} he is offended{G4624}.

He{G4687} also{G1161} that received seed{G4687} among{G1519} the thorns{G3588} is{G2076} he{G3778} that heareth{G191} the word{G3588}; and{G2532} the care{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588}, and{G2532} the deceitfulness{G3588} of riches{G3588}, choke{G4846} the word{G3588}, and{G2532} he becometh{G1096} unfruitful{G175}.

But{G1161} he that received seed{G4687} into{G1909} the{G3588} good{G2570} ground{G1093}is{G2076} he{G3778} that heareth{G191} the word{G3588}, and{G2532} understandeth{G4920} it; which{G3739} also{G1211} beareth fruit{G2592}, and{G2532} bringeth forth{G4160}, some{G3739} an hundredfold{G1540}, some{G3739} sixty{G1835}, some{G3739} thirty{G5144}.

But{G1161} while{G1722} men{G3588} slept{G2518}, his{G846} enemy{G2190} came{G2064} and{G2532} sowed{G4687} tares{G2215} among{G3319} the wheat{G3588}, and{G2532} went his way{G565}.
But{G1161} when{G3753} the blade{G3588} was sprung up{G985}, and{G2532} brought forth{G4160} fruit{G2590}, then{G5119} appeared{G5316} the tares{G3588} also{G2532}.

So{G1161} the servants{G3588} of the householder{G3588} came{G4334} and said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, didst{G4687} not{G3780} thou sow{G4687} good{G2570} seed{G4690} in{G1722} thy{G4674} field{G68}? from whence{G4159} then{G3767} hath it{G2192} tares{G3588}?

He said{G5346} unto them{G846}, An enemy{G2190} hath done{G4160} this{G5124}. The servants{G1401} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Wilt thou{G2309} then{G3767} that we go{G565} and gather{G4816} them{G846} up{G4816}?

But{G1161} he said{G5346}, Nay{G3756}; lest{G3379} while ye gather up{G4816} the tares{G3588}, ye root up also{G1610} the wheat{G3588} with{G260} them{G846}.ama should perhaps split between the also and the with. I marked it as a preposition on autois but having autois cover "with them" and having ama cover "also" is just as likely in its way.

Let{G863} both{G297} grow together{G4885} until{G3360} the harvest{G3588}: and{G2532} in{G1722} the time{G3588} of harvest{G3588} I will say{G2046} to the reapers{G3588}, Gather ye together{G4816} first{G4412} the tares{G3588}, and{G2532} bind{G1210} them{G846} in{G1519} bundles{G1197} to{G4314} burn{G2618} them{G846}: but{G1161} gather{G4863} the wheat{G4621} into{G1519} my{G3450} barn{G3588}.

Another{G243} parable{G3850} put he forth{G3908} unto them{G846}, saying{G3004}, The kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} is{G2076} like to{G3664} a grain{G2848} of mustard seed{G4615}, which{G3739} a man{G444} took{G2983}, and sowed{G4687} in{G1722} his{G846} field{G3588}:

Which{G3739} indeed{G3303} is{G2076} the least{G3398} of all{G3956} seeds{G3588}: but{G1161} when{G3752} it is grown{G837}, it is{G2076} the greatest{G3173} among herbs{G3588}, and{G2532} becometh{G1096} a tree{G1186}, so that{G5620} the birds{G3588} of the air{G3588} come{G2064} and{G2532} lodge{G2681} in{G1722} the branches{G3588} thereof{G846}.

Another{G243} parable{G3850} spake he{G2980} unto them{G846}; The kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} is{G2076} like unto{G3664} leaven{G2219}, which{G3739} a woman{G1135} took{G2983}, and hid{G1470} in{G1519} three{G5140} measures{G4568} of meal{G224}till{G2193} the whole{G3650} was leavened{G2220}.
All{G3956} these things{G5023} spake{G2980} Jesus{G3588} unto the multitude{G3588} in{G1722} parables{G3850}; and{G2532} without{G5565} a parable{G3850} spake he{G2980} not{G3756} unto them{G846}:

That{G3704} it might be fulfilled{G4137} which was spoken{G4483} by{G1223} the prophet{G3588}, saying{G3004}, I will open{G455} my{G3450} mouth{G3588} in{G1722} parables{G3850}; I will utter{G2044} things which have been kept secret{G2928} from{G575} the foundation{G2602} of the world{G2889}.

The field{G68} is{G2076} the world{G3588}; the good{G2570} seed{G4690} are{G1526} the children{G3588} of the kingdom{G3588}; but{G1161} the tares{G2215} are{G1526} the children{G3588} of the wicked{G4190} one;
The enemy{G2190} that sowed{G4687} them{G846} is{G2076} the devil{G1228}; the harvest{G2326} is{G2076} the end{G4930} of the world{G3588}; and{G1161} the reapers{G2327} are{G1526} the angels{G32}.
As{G5618} therefore{G3767} the tares{G3588} are gathered{G4816} and{G2532} burned{G2618} in the fire{G4442}; so{G3779} shall it be{G2071} in{G1722} the end{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588}.

The Son{G3588} of man{G3588} shall send forth{G649} his{G846} angels{G3588}, and{G2532} they shall gather{G4816} out of{G1537} his{G846} kingdom{G3588} all{G3956} things that offend{G3588}, and{G2532} them which do{G4160} iniquity{G3588};
And{G2532} shall cast{G906} them{G846} into{G1519} a furnace{G3588} of fire{G3588}: there{G1563} shall be{G2071} wailing{G3588} and{G2532} gnashing{G3588} of teeth{G3588}.

Then{G5119} shall{G1584} the righteous{G1342} shine forth{G1584} as{G5613} the sun{G3588} in{G1722} the kingdom{G3588} of{G3588} their{G846} Father{G3962}. Who hath{G2192} ears{G3775} to hear{G191}, let him hear{G191}.

Again{G3825}, the kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} is{G2076} like unto{G3664} treasure{G2344} hid{G2928} in{G1722} a field{G3588}; the which{G3739} when a man{G444} hath found{G2147}, he hideth{G2928}, and{G2532} for{G575} joy{G3588} thereof{G846} goeth{G5217} and{G2532} selleth{G4453} all{G3956} that{G3745} he hath{G2192}, and{G2532} buyeth{G59} that{G1565} field{G3588}.
Again{G3825}, the kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} is{G2076} like unto{G3664} a merchant{G1713} man{G444}seeking{G2212} goodly{G2570} pearls{G3135}:
Who{G3739}, when he had found{G2147} one{G1520} pearl{G3135} of great price{G4186}, went{G565} and sold{G4097} all{G3956} that{G3745} he had{G2192}, and{G2532} bought{G59} it{G846}.

Again{G3825}, the kingdom{G3588} of heaven{G3588} is{G2076} like unto{G3664} a net{G4522}, that was cast{G906} into{G1519} the sea{G3588}, and{G2532} gathered{G4863} of{G1537} every{G3956} kind{G1085}:

Which{G3739}, when{G3753} it was full{G4137}, they drew{G307} to{G1909} shore{G3588}, and{G2532} sat down{G2523}, and gathered{G4816} the good{G2570} into{G1519} vessels{G30}, but{G1161} cast{G906} the bad{G4550} away{G1854}.

And{G2532} it came to pass{G1096}, that when{G3753} Jesus{G3588} had finished{G5055} these{G3778} parables{G3588}, he departed{G3332} thence{G1564}.

And{G2532} when he was come{G2064} into{G1519} his own{G846} country{G3588}, he taught{G1321} them{G846} in{G1722} their{G846} synagogue{G3588}, insomuch that{G5620} they{G846} were astonished{G1605}, and{G2532} said{G3004}, Whence{G4159} hath this{G5129} man this{G3778} wisdom{G3588}, and{G2532} these mighty works{G3588}?

And{G2532} his{G846} sisters{G3588}, are they{G1526} not{G3780} all{G3956} with{G4314} us{G2248}? Whence{G4159} then{G3767} hath this{G5129} man all{G3956} these things{G5023}?

And{G2532} they were offended{G4624} in{G1722} him{G846}. But{G1161} Jesus{G2424} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, A prophet{G4396} is{G2076} not{G3756} without honour{G820}, save{G3361} in{G1722} his own{G846} country{G3588}, and{G2532} in{G1722} his own{G846} house{G3588}.
And{G2532} he did{G4160}not{G3756} many{G4183} mighty works{G1411} there{G1563} because of{G1223} their{G846} unbelief{G3588}.
